messages.msgSnippet: Im doing another college project on samurai films, and am trying to research and write about the life of the film director Kenji Misumi who directed the Lone
messages.messageBody:
Im doing another college project on samurai films, and am trying to research and write about the life of the film director Kenji Misumi who directed the Lone Wolf And Cub films and the Zatoichi series, with no luck on finding any information except a list of the films that he directed. Can you direct me to any sites with a more detailed bigraphy about him?

arigato!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Kirana

Hara-kiri If you're ever unfortunate enough to
be captured by a vegetable or snack, you must do the honourable
thing. This training film shows the beginner the official way to say farewell.

After all, even in matters of self disembowelment a man must retain a sense of proportion.
